title: Can't connect to chat.
body: nothing has changed on my network I've used your support guide on this issue. only started Friday/Sunday. thoughts?

replies.body:
I've started to notice a fair bit more of these issues than usual, so I'm wondering if there might be something going on with our chat servers. Before jumping to that conclusion, let's go ahead and try a few troubleshooting steps to make sure your network can get a clean connection with us. 

Check out this [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, paying special attention to port forwarding using the port 5223. Let me know if those steps are able to help or not!
